titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the Right Honourable Sir Robert Clayton, Lord Mayor of London, at Guild-Hall-Chappel, December 7, 1679 by Thomas Mannyngham ...
titleStmt.author: Manningham, Thomas, 1651?-1722.

notesStmt.note: Later issued as the first of the Six sermons preached on the occasions following ... 1687.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
